text: Bhai yaar tu bahut accha insaan h, first year me dopa tha to tere paas hi aata tha main study material lene xd. and humne kuch jyada time spend nhi kiya per yaar tujhse acchi vibes hi aati hain mujhe, and tujhe kabhi kabhi pareshaan karne me bhi maje aate thhe. wing me sabse bhola tu hi lagta h mere baad xd. yaar tu jyada baat nhi karta per contact me rehna. bahut miss karunga broðŸ˜­
author: Naveen

text: kitna pyaara banda h bhia tu yaar, first year me takneek se hi janne lag gye thhe and hamesha jab bhi milte thhe kuch chhoti masti kar hi lete thhe, bhai tune hamesha mth ke notes diye hain mujhe kaise shukriya ada karu. aisi itni khaas memories nhi thi lekin vo chhote chhote pal kaafi majedaar thhe , tum log mujhe astro boy bulane lag gaye thhe xd, but yaar abhi last month me maje kiye thhe bahut humne, tu bhi wing me aa hi jata thha kabhi kabhi. yaar main bahut impress hua jab tune music ke liye placement chhod diya. bhai you will surely go a long way and kabhi baat karne ka mann ho to main to ready hi hu. bas keep going. dehradun aayenge ghumne agar ho paaya to. see you soon bro
author: Naveen

text: Jaisa pandey ne likha h mere seed ka khyal rakhna my love. itni mehnat ki thi hum sabne tujhe vo gift dene me XD. but iss ek mahine hi main tere saath jyada raha hu aur bhai ye to bahut yaad aayega. (tum doge na mera saath)
author: Naveen

text: yaar jitna bhi gaali do tujhe fir muh utha ke hamesha chala aata tha khelne, jitne bhi match khele sabme bsdka out hoke aa jata tha. per at least mujhe match khelne le jata thaa yaar, mann nhi hota tha tab bhi uthakar le jata tha vo sahi baat h bas teri. baki to tu madarchod h XD. but yahi sab memories hain yaar, first year me sabse pahle jab saath khele thhe vo to bhul hi nhi sakta baaki teri shakal hi aisi h jo kabhi nhi bhulai jati. fir milenge kabhi aur khelenge bhai.
author: Naveen

text:
madarchod saale sab cheeje jo na batane ko bolta hu wo gaa deta h sabme bsdwale. hero banta h saala. per yaaar dumbsee to tune hi khelna sikhaya tha. jab dekho tab k******-chan karta rehta h
usse bhi badi duniya h meri. per yaar cricket jo khelte thhe bhai rojana maja aa jata thha dhulai karke XD. bhai bahut yaad aayegi yaar bahut bahut bahut bahut bhai
author: Naveen

text: yaar hum log first year ke start se hi astro club me involved thhe lekin second year ke end tak koi word exchange shayad hi kiya thhaðŸ˜‚. lekin coordie bane to aisa nhi laga ki pahli baar baat kar rahe hain. per vo summer best summer thha college ka yaar, rojana raat ko rooftop pe nightout, club me hi so jana, humne events bhi itne saare karwaye thhe, vo bacchon wala jisme hamara kata thha xd, shobhan mandir, bacchon ko presentation prepare karwana, snt day pe telescope se beehive dekhna, and vo khaane ki baat 2-3 ghante tak karna, farukhabad bhi gaye thhe main aur tarish tujhe liye binaðŸ˜…. literally best summer. bahut maza thha yaar. fir observatory ki sirf safai karnaðŸ˜‚. yaar mujhe to bahut yaad aane wala h. let's see next kab milte hain
author: Naveen

text: kya be saale 4 saal gym gaya h fir bhi waisa ka waisa hi h sukha sa tinka. randirone me koi tujhe peeche nhi chhod sakta. bhai thoda chill hoke raha kar koi kuch nhi bigadega tera saala randibaaz abhi bhi vo acad area wala scene yaad aa gaya bsdwale chupchap nikal jaate. aur dekh lunga bhai one piece chinta mat kar. yaar ab yaad to sabse jyada mujhe hi aayegi (rone wala emoji). bhaiii maja aata thha yaar jab tum chidhate thhe mujhe (tu, avinash, ankit) bahut cute lagte thhe bolte hue uss timeðŸ¥º
author: Naveen

text: bhai coordie bane tabhi janna start kiya tha lekin summer me hum log kaafi familier ho gaye thhe. fir kaafi baar stargazing ki tum logon ne bhi. aur ek banda nhi aata tha tum teeno saath hi aate thhe. mujhe bhi maja aata sessions karane me, aero ke bacchon ko bhi karaya tha kaafi baar. tujhse kaafi positive vibes aati thi mujhe, ekdum acche se baat karta tha hans hans ke majedaar din thhe vo bhi yaar, vo summer to kabhi nhi bhul sakte. poori raat rooftop pe and tum log lights off karke cooperate karte thhe. accha tha yaar. fir milenge kabhi :)
author: Naveen

text:
bhai apna handsome boy h wing ka. 2nd year me hi baat hui thhi apni thodi jab hum teri purani stories sunte thhe. uske baad summer me tere ghar bhi aaye majedar tha vo. per inn sabko overshadow last ke ek mahine kar diya.
bhai jo bakchodiyan ki hain, cricket, volleyball, dumbsee, chhat pe raat ko baatein, hum dono me kaafi similarities lagti hain mujhe kuch points pe. bas main thode chutiyape karta hu jo tujhe pata hi h to bacha lena mujhe aise chutiyapo se. tujhse to hamesha contact me rahunga(kaam ka banda banega XD).
khubsurat vo nazare bahut yaad aayenge yaar. (main sahi me blush kar raha thha uss din)
author: Naveen

text: hum log to saath hi thhe second year tak lekin fir wing se jaane ke baad bichhad gaya. bas tata bye bye kahtm gaya . maje to kiye thhe first year me lekin third year tak aate aate kaafi dur ho gaye. agar campus aata to positive note pe end hoti college life bhai but samajh aata h kyun nhi aaya. kabhi milke kasar poori karenge yaar.ðŸ˜­
author: Naveen

text: bhai yaar sabse pahle itni maturity aati kahan se h, aise paida hua tha kya? fir kabhi kabhi aisi harkate karta h ki saala ye kon aa gaya jaspreet ki body me. per yaar vo 11 aur 12 baje wali class se pahle jo samose khate thhe bhai vo kabhi nhi bhul sakte, main tu aur vikky best tha best. lekin gensec banne ke baad to sab chhod diya class jana, padhna. per fir bhi behenchod hum dono se jyada marks le aata thha. itni jealosy hoti thi hume espacially vikky ko. but tu to chapu h. yaad to bahut aayegi unn raton ki jab tu 5 min sone ka kahta tha aur saala 1 ghanta so jata thha. rojana uthane aata tha main per class nhi jata tha. abhi ek saal me mast chaapna. love you. aur milte to rahenge hi bas canada mat jana
author: Naveen

text: yo!! TA202 me bahut maje kiye thhe humne. kuch kaam karte nhi thhe bas bakchodiyan hi karte thhe and last me jo cake banaya thha foam ka vo videos dekhne me maje hi aate hain. but usse bhi pahle first year me hum treasure hunt me saath thhe (ye mujhe lockdown me realise hua). bas itna hi h.
author: Naveen

text: bhai hum log close to nhi thhe kabhi , itna time bhi spend nhi kiya kabhi, apne atmosphere me rahte thhe hum log. per yaar last me tune jo emotional kiya h video banake bhai vo bahut thha tujhe janne ke liye. first year me humne katwaya thha art of living me. treasure hunt me bhi saath me thhe, fir crescendo me jo dance kiya thha maza aa gaya tha yaar. haan first year me to cricket bhi khele thhe saath. iske baad to bichhad se gaye thhe. per jitna bhi thha bhoola nhi jaayega. next year campus khulega to aayenge :)
author: Naveen

text:
aur mere 2 saal ke roommate. sab kuch to janta h aur main bhi janta hu per fir bhi chalo thoda sa likh deta hu.
saale duniya ki saari musibate tere pe hi kyon aati hain (jethalal h kya bsdk) fir randirona karta h aake mere paas (jaise main taarak hu per nhi hu) although harr jagah ladna tere khoon me h, aur saala sookha sa to tha fir bhi bhid jata tha (maja aata tha dekhne meðŸ˜‚) per yaar jitna harami dikhta h utna h nhi, andar se bahut soft h ye sirf main hi janta hu poori wing meðŸ˜˜. rojana hall 4 canteen jana. first year me line laga di thi OAT jane ki. exam me padhne se jyada khaate thhe fir bhi jaise taise paas hoke nikal gaye. yaar jo dreams hain tere unko pursue kar I am sure kaamyaab hoga. aur kabhi bhi low feel kare to main to hu hi tere randirone sunne ke liyeðŸ˜œ. itna thik h aur jyada nhi likha jayegaðŸ˜­.
author: Naveen

text: hello bhai, yaar first year takneek me saath thhe hum log, fir humne jab mandakini me participate kiya tha pahle to questions badi mushkil se ho rahe thhe, lekin first round tune nikalwa diya thha fir 3rd kaise aa gaye pata hi nhi chala, jaidev ko harane me maja aaya thha, fir secy bane to bacchon ko saath me sikhaya humne, tune to dara bhi diya tha unko xd. and fir vo raat jab humne lost explorer ke questions banaye thhe tarish ke room pe, bhaai answer leke usse questions bana rahe thhe hum log, maja aaya thha usme bahut. uske baad to hum log jyada nhi mile per jo bhi memories hain vo bahut acchi hain yaar, milenge bhai kabhi
author: Naveen

text: baniyon ka baniya h bhai tu. although ek do baar treat de di thi tune per main nhi tha usme. baaki behaviour itna chill h yaar. kitna bhi chidalo kuh hota hi nhi h.
author: Naveen

text:
bro first year me hi mile thhe per kuch jaan pehchan nhi hui thi apni, fir secy bane to bhi main to chup hi rehta tha, lekin jaane lag gaye thhe, astro club me jo bakchodiyan ki hain bhai maje aate thhe uss time. abhi bhi sochta hu to rooftop pe laser pointer pakadke stars point out karne ka mann karta h.
baaki to uske baad interact nhi kiye per jitni memories hain acchi hain. fir milenge :)
author: Naveen

text: harr cheej ki knowledge hoti h tujhe bhai. kitna kuch karta rehta h fir bhi wingies ke saath time nikal leta h. apan to chachere bhai hain bachpan se, per fir thoda kam hi time saath me bitaya h but jo bhi tha vo bahut badhiya tha. will miss you kutiya
author: Naveen

text:
bhadwe saale, tujhpe itna gussa aata tha na mujhe ki kya batau, itna bura behaviour tha pahle. lekin ab thoda change hua h to itna gussa nhi aata. tech enthusiast to tu h, itni saari cheeje karta rehta h. best quality teri ek hi thi time management ki jo bahut sahi tha lekin uske alawa aadmi accha nhi tha XD.
per yaar last mahine me jo memories banai hain vo bhulayi nhi jaa sakti. kitna sahi tha sab rojana bakchodiyan. bahut yaad aayegi yaar :(
author: Naveen

text: hamare hall ka mth DR1ðŸ˜‚. yaar mth kaafi courses me tune hi help kari thi bhai, raat ko tere hi paas aate thhe notes lene bhi, assignment karne bhi, samjha to deta tha per saala jaldi so jata thha. per chalo in the end corona ki mkc. abhi aata to maje aate yaar. fir milenge kabhi
author: Naveen

text: Arre tushy boi, bhai hum log saath me to bahut rahe hain per close kabhi nhi rahe, pata nhi kya tha. lekin yaar saath me ki hain humne kaafi cheeje antaragni, techkriti,, gpl lena, treats sab saath. tu kaafi curious banda h jitna maine observe kiya h aur yahi sabse acchi quality h, iss curiousity ko maintain rakhna. baaki yaar volleyball khelna aur tujhe bowling ki practice karana yaad hai mujhe, kaafi baar logo ke sir phod deta tu even leather ball se xd. reunion karenge bhai kabhi
author: Naveen

text: Bhai bolu ya machine, har kaam ko karta h saala fir bhi free rehta h, padhai me chaapa, khel me chaapa fir guitar, chess, singer aur kya kya. yaar 3 saal to humne saath bitaye (kya time tha yaar vo) jab bacchon ki wajah se gaand phat gayi thi XD and fir kitna roya tha , yaar godi me so jata tha meri bahut apnapan lagta tha , per last mahine me chhod ke chala gaya tu, per fir bhi tere liye mera pyaar kam nhi hoga. bhai bas ab robot mat rahna , call kar lena kabhi kabhi. bahut yaad aati h yaar :(
author: Naveen

text: Oh my god what a journey we have had. first year me bhai ne jo padhaya h yaar saare course pass karwaye thhe. kabhi kabhi gussa aa jata h per kaafi thoughtful h. I always get inspired from you and kaafi kuch seekha h. aur likhne ko to fir itni saari batein hain but itna enough h.
author: Naveen

text: yaar chaapu banda h bhai tu, poora time padhta rehta thha saala, first year me to bas pareshaan karte thhe thoda sa tere room pe aake lekin main time to humne third year ke winters me hi bitaya thha. bhai kya mast time thha, rojana subah main tum logo ko jagata thha fir gym jaate thhe (kuch din hi xd). fir breakfast, lunch, dinner sab saath me karte thhe hall 5ka khana bahut pasand aa gaya tha, fir khaane ke  baad fussball khelte thhe usme to alag hi maje aate thhe, and tujhe alien aur baccha kahke chidhane me maje aate thhe. bhai bhulna mat yaar kyonki main to nhi bhulne wala. milenge fir apan to rajasthan me hi hain
author: Naveen
